scripts.auth:codeartifact: bash scripts/netlify-auth.sh || (AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=${AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID_MK:-$AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID} AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=${AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY_MK:-$AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY} AWS_DEFAULT_REGION=${AWS_DEFAULT_REGION:-eu-west-1} aws codeartifact login --tool npm --repository ui-component-library --domain motork --domain-owner 678121811175 --region eu-west-1)
scripts.preinstall: bash scripts/netlify-auth.sh || (echo 'ERROR: CodeArtifact authentication failed!' && exit 1)
